Apps Using WhirlyGlobe-Maply

A toolkit is only as good as the apps that use it. Here are some of our favorites. If you’d like to be included, just send an image, a short description and a link.

ADSB View

ADS-B View is a NextGen airspace app that provides graphical weather, traffic and text data to the aircraft pilot/crew.

AeroTab EFB

AeroTab EFB is an Electronic Flight Bag app specialising in the Russian and the CIS Region.

AerovieReports

An electronic flight bag (EFB) app with TAWS, EDR, and terrain support. Made by Bryan Heitman.

ClimEarth

CLIMEARTH is a mobile application designed and produced by CMCC, the Euro-Mediterranean Center on climate Change to show important climate related data sets.

Dark Sky

Dark Sky is one of the Apple app store's favorite weather apps. Not only will it tell when it's going to rain it'll show you beautiful animated weather and temperature data.

Deforestation Visualization

A visualization by José Manuel Navarro made for Vizzuality. It shows deforestation in Indonesia over time. Colored vectors are used to denote intensity.

Economist - World in Figures

World in Figures is a very early WhirlyGlobe app. Cool concept.

eLLaWalk

eLLaWalk is part of the promotion for the new eLLa fragrance from Victorinox. This Android app lets you see your organized walks on your device.

Epicenter

An interactive, animated app plotting the latest 30 days of USGS earthquake data.

Flightwise Flight Tracker

This is a flight tracker for individual commercial flights.

Flightwise Flight Planner

An aviation app designed for pilots that can create and file flight plans, view aviation charts and weather and lookup airport information.

flyTab

FlyTab Cockpit is an avionics test environment and simulator for the flyTab avionics platform.

FlyQ EFB

One of the more popular aviation planning and visualization apps. Made by Seattle Avionics, this is one of the most complex WhirlyGlobe-Maply apps.

Gaia GPS

Gaia GPS was featured in Apple's Your Verse stories, Gaia GPS helps people explore remote places, and stay safer in the woods.

Global Schooner

Take an interactive journey across the globe with Prairie Schooner, complete with exclusive content and more than 300 profiles of authors from around the world.

InterAtlas

Inter Atlas has the distinction of being the first WhirlyGlobe app. It's a neat little geography tool hooked up to wikipedia.

Mapbox Earth

Mapbox Earth is a neat little browser for Mapbox's excellent satellite imagery data sets.

Miizee

Use Miizee to broadcast HD quality live events on-the-go from any location to any screen using only your Facebook account to connect with the world.

National Geographic World Atlas

A very popular reference app on iOS, version 4.0 uses WhirlyGlobe to great effect.

Offline Topo Maps

Offline Topo Maps is a simpler version of Gaia GPS.

Planet.ly

Planet.ly is a fun news aggregator that shows you what's happening around the globe.

Pray 2x714

Join with others around the world in prayer as each time zone prays together at 7:14.

Santa's Big Helper

Santa's Big Helper is a cute holiday app for tracking Santa Claus as he journeys around the globe.

Skipper

Skipper is mobile charts done right. A seamless chart-plotter, with data synced across all of your devices, and backed up to the cloud.

SmartPlates & Charts

An aviation display app for FAA sectionals, charts, and other data.

Stratalogica

Stratalogica is a big, gorgeous interactive globe for students of all ages. You can browse existing content or make your own with an on-globe editor.

Symantec Protection Center Mobile

The Protection Center Mobile app from Symantex shows global network threats around the world.

Tremor Tracker

Tremor Tracker lets you see recent earthquakes around the globe.

WhirlyViz

WhirlyViz is a data visualization engine for iPad and iPhone. It uses Javascript modules to let users play with big, complex data sets.

Xweather - Extreme Weather

Xweather displays extreme weather related events on a globe.
  • WhirlyGlobe-Maply

An open source geospatial display toolkit
for iOS and Android.
